Text: Buried Country is a highly regarded documentary film, book and soundtrack album and now also a stageshow as well.
Triplets:<Buried Country
1:
--------------------
Text: Buried Country:  It is a prosopography, created by noted writer Clinton Walker, that tells the story of Australian country music in the Aboriginal community by focussing on the genre's most important stars.
Triplets:<Buried Country
